children.name: 30-axisspan.js
children.title: Axis spanning
children.description:
You can use axis spanning to display multiple axes next to each other, in the x or in the y direction.
Axes that would clash together will be shifted as to avoid collisions.
children.highlighted: define(function (require, exports, module) { module.exports = ( domGraph ) => { var graph = new Graph( domGraph, { }, { } ); graph.resize("400", "300"); graph.getLeftAxis(0).setSpan( 0.0, 0.55 ).turnGridsOff().setLabel("Colorado"); graph.getLeftAxis(1).setSpan( 0.5, 1 ).turnGridsOff().setLabel("California"); graph.getLeftAxis(2).setSpan( 0.6, 0.8 ).turnGridsOff().setLabel("Kentucky"); graph.getBottomAxis().setPrimaryGridColor("rgba( 100, 100, 0, 0.5 )").setLabel("Year"); var colorado = [[2015,17559.393],[2014,17944.255],[2013,18881.823],[2012,19263.158],[2011,18744.067],[2010,18978.981],[2009,17351.28],[2008,18961.826],[2007,19532.855],[2006,19707.00899],[2005,19013.11703],[2004,19251.20903],[2003,19595.836],[2002,19446.04],[2001,19764.973]]; var california = [[2015,34522.242],[2014,39213.757],[2013,39474.651],[2012,38978.114],[2011,42542.656],[2010,41890.627],[2009,39271.173],[2008,42190.776],[2007,41064.161],[2006,41937.83301],[2005,40352.02201],[2004,39342.39199],[2003,38521.048],[2002,38604.897],[2001,41305.269]]; var kentucky = [[2015,664.166],[2014,878.434],[2013,915.246],[2012,1183.112],[2011,1539.699],[2010,1542.78],[2009,1521.939],[2008,1723.062],[2007,1752.384],[2006,1710.887],[2005,1676.522],[2004,1731.218],[2003,1727.233],[2002,1821.618],[2001,1739.07]]; colorado = Graph.newWaveform().setData( colorado.map( e => e[ 1 ] ), colorado.map( e => e[ 0 ] ) ); california = Graph.newWaveform().setData( california.map( e => e[ 1 ] ), california.map( e => e[ 0 ] ) ); kentucky = Graph.newWaveform().setData( kentucky.map( e => e[ 1 ] ), kentucky.map( e => e[ 0 ] ) ); graph .newSerie( "colorado" ) .setWaveform( colorado ) .autoAxis() .setYAxis( graph.getLeftAxis( 0 ) ) .setLineColor("#CF4E4E") .setLineWidth( 2 ); graph.getLeftAxis( 0 ) .forceMin( 16000 ) .forceMax( 19600 ); graph .newSerie( "california" ) .setWaveform( california ) .autoAxis() .setYAxis( graph.getLeftAxis( 1 ) ) .setLineColor("#3EA63E") .setLineWidth( 2 ); graph .newSerie( "kentucky" ) .setWaveform( kentucky ) .autoAxis() .setYAxis( graph.getLeftAxis( 2 ) ) .setLineColor("#2F7C7C") .setLineWidth( 2 ); graph.draw(); return graph; }});

children.name: 40-xrd.js
children.title: XRD spectrum using axis splitting
children.highlighted: define(function (require, exports, module) { module.exports = ( domGraph ) => { var graph = new Graph( domGraph, { plugins: { 'axissplitting': {} } } ); graph.resize( 400, 400 ); var bottom = graph.getPlugin('axissplitting').newBottomAxis(); bottom.init( graph, {} ); bottom.splitAxis( 0.2 ); bottom.setChunkBoundaries( [ [ 10, 15 ], [ 16, 60 ] ] ); bottom.gridsOff(); bottom.setLabel("2 Theta").setUnit( "°" ).setUnitWrapper( "(", ")" ); graph.setBottomAxis( bottom, 0 ); bottom.axes[ 0 ].setNbTicksPrimary( 3 ); graph.getLeftAxis( 0 ).setSpan( 0, 0.30 ).hide(); graph.getLeftAxis( 1 ).setSpan( 0.35, 0.65 ).hide(); graph.getLeftAxis( 2 ).setSpan( 0.70, 1 ).hide(); var serie = graph.getPlugin('axissplitting').newLineSerie( "chlorobenzene" ) .setXAxis( bottom ) .setYAxis( graph.getLeftAxis( 0 ) ) .setWaveform( data1 ) .setLineColor( "#c41a1a" ) .setLabel("Chlorobenzene"); var serie = graph.getPlugin('axissplitting').newLineSerie( "ethanol" ) .setXAxis( bottom ) .setYAxis( graph.getLeftAxis( 1 ) ) .setWaveform( data2 ) .setLineColor( "#0c8e0f" ) .setLabel("Ethanol"); var serie = graph.getPlugin('axissplitting').newLineSerie( "dimethylformamde" ) .setXAxis( bottom ) .setYAxis( graph.getLeftAxis( 2 ) ) .setWaveform( data3 ) .setLineColor("#1331bf") .setLabel("N,N-dimethylformamide"); var legend = graph.makeLegend({ backgroundColor: 'transparent', frame: false }); legend.seriesHideable = false; legend.setPosition( graph.newPosition( { x: graph.getDrawingSpaceMaxX(), dx: "0px", y: graph.getDrawingSpaceMinY() } ), "right", "top" ); graph.draw(); graph .newShape( "label" ) .setLabelPosition( { x: 14.22, dy: "-8px" } ) .setSerie( graph.getSerie("chlorobenzene").subSeries[ 0 ] ) .setLabelText( "§" ) .setLabelAnchor('middle') .draw().redraw(); graph .newShape( "label" ) .setLabelPosition( { x: 28.58, dy: "-8px" } ) .setSerie( graph.getSerie("chlorobenzene").subSeries[ 1 ] ) .setLabelText( "§" ) .setLabelAnchor('middle') .draw().redraw(); graph .newShape( "label" ) .setLabelPosition( { x: 31.972, dy: "-8px" } ) .setSerie( graph.getSerie("chlorobenzene").subSeries[ 1 ] ) .setLabelText( "§" ) .setLabelAnchor('middle') .draw().redraw(); graph .newShape( "label" ) .setLabelPosition( { x: 11.317, dy: "-8px" } ) .setSerie( graph.getSerie("ethanol").subSeries[ 0 ] ) .setLabelText( "*" ) .setLabelAnchor('middle') .draw().redraw(); graph .newShape( "label" ) .setLabelPosition( { x: 12.721, dy: "-8px" } ) .setSerie( graph.getSerie("ethanol").subSeries[ 0 ] ) .setLabelText( "*" ) .setLabelAnchor('middle') .draw().redraw(); graph .newShape( "label" ) .setLabelPosition( { x: 12.721, dy: "-8px" } ) .setSerie( graph.getSerie("chlorobenzene").subSeries[ 0 ] ) .setLabelText( "*" ) .setLabelAnchor('middle') .draw().redraw(); graph.autoscaleAxes(); graph.draw(); legend.update(); return graph; } });

children.name: 50-gradient.js
children.title: Using color map
children.highlighted: define( function( require, exports, module ) { module.exports = ( domGraph ) => { var graph = new Graph( domGraph, {}, {} ); graph.resize( 400, 80 ); graph .getXAxis() .forceMin( 0.5 ) .forceMax( 1 ) .forcePrimaryTickUnit( 0.1 ); /*.turnGridsOff() .setDisplay( false );*/ graph .getYAxis() .turnGridsOff() .setDisplay( false ); var s = graph.newSerie( 'density', {}, 'densitymap' ); var data = []; for ( var i = 0.5; i <= 1; i += 1 / 200 ) { // for( var j = 0; j < i; j += 1 / 200 ) { data.push( [ i ] ); //} } s.setDensityMap( data, 0.5, 1 / 200, -0.5, 1 ); s.autoAxis(); graph .getYAxis() .forceMin( -0.5 ) .forceMax( 0.5 ); //s.setPxPerBin( false, 20, true ); //s.setBinsFromTo( 'x', -0.005, 200, 1 ); //s.setBinsFromTo( 'y', -0.5, 0.5, 1 ); s.colorMapHSL( [ { h: 0, s: 1, l: 0.5 }, // Red { h: 270, s: 1, l: 0.5 } // Yellow ], 300 ); // Use 300 colors for ( var i = 0.5; i <= 1; i += 0.05 ) { let s = graph.newShape( 'line' ); s.setPosition( { x: i * 1, y: -0.5 }, 0 ); s.setPosition( { x: i * 1, y: 0.5 }, 1 ); s.setStrokeColor( 'black' ); s.draw().redraw(); } graph.draw(); return graph; }; } );

children.name: 52-gradient2.js
children.title: Density map usage
children.highlighted: define( function( require, exports, module ) { module.exports = ( domGraph ) => { var graph = new Graph( domGraph ).resize( 350, 300 ); $.get( './datasets/density.txt', {}, function( txt ) { var data = txt.split( '\n' ).map( function( el ) { return el.split( '\t' ).map( parseFloat ); } ); graph.resize( 400, 300 ); graph.getXAxis().turnGridsOff(); graph.getYAxis().turnGridsOff(); var s = graph.newSerie( 's1', {}, 'densitymap' ); s.setData( data ).autoAxis(); s.setPxPerBin( 5, 5, false ); s.colorMapHSL( [ { h: 270, s: 1, l: 0.5 }, // Black { h: 0, s: 1, l: 0.5 } // Red ], 300 ); // Use 300 colors graph.draw(); } ); return graph; }; } );
